name: NeoStation
summary: Modern, user-centric frontend for retro gaming with cloud sync
description: NeoStation is a modern retro gaming frontend that prioritizes exceptional UX/UI design and seamless cross-platform compatibility. Features include deep RetroArch integration for classic consoles, Nintendo Switch emulator support (Eden, Citron, Ryujinx), NeoSync cloud-based save synchronization across all devices, intuitive touch/gamepad controls, and native support across Android, Windows, macOS, iOS, and Linux. Clean interface designed for both desktop and mobile experiences.
